backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing authorization, user profiles, books, carts, orders, balances, and an async customer support messaging system with admin replies.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module initializing new support message fields and nextMessageId while preserving existing userProfiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to their related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining color tokens, themes, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main React router, theme provider, and application route tree for all pages.
Route guard that restricts access to authenticated admin users and shows appropriate error states.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating with Internet Identity and handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/books/BookCard.t: UI card component displaying book metadata, cover image, price, and navigation links.
frontend/src/components/books/CoverImage: Renders a book cover image using a fixed generated asset with fallback to an inline SVG placeholder on error.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable UI component for displaying placeholder or empty content states.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays footer with social links, customer service chat trigger, and attribution info.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Shows site navigation, user balance, cart button with item count, and login handling based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Wraps the page with header, footer, main content outlet, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Provides a configurable max‑width container for page content with padding.
frontend/src/components/library/BookCont: Modal dialog for displaying purchased book content with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/support/Customer: Provides a chat dialog for submitting support messages and viewing threaded responses with authentication-aware behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, updating it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile and checking admin status using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBalance.ts: Hooks for retrieving user token balance and minting new tokens via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBooks.ts: Hooks to query, add, update, and delete books, with cache invalidation for related book queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Hooks for cart CRUD operations, checkout, and deriving cart items with book data and totals.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, handling login state and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibrary.ts: Builds a user’s library by joining delivered book IDs with all books and fetches purchased book content via actor queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching individual orders, the current user's orders, and all orders using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating queries are grouped in feature-specific hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupportChat.ts: Implements support chat operations including sending messages, fetching user/admin messages, polling responses, and replying as admin.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom light/dark color palette for the app’s UI theme.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCatalogPag: Admin interface for listing, adding, editing, and managing books in the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Top-level admin dashboard with tabs for catalog, orders, minting, and support inbox.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMintPage.t: Admin form for minting GLDT tokens to a specified principal with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays all customer orders with IDs, customer principals, item details, totals, and dates using table components.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupportInb: Shows grouped customer support message threads and allows admins to view messages and send replies.
frontend/src/pages/BookDetailsPage.tsx: Displays book details, price, availability, and allows logged‑in users to add the book to their cart.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shows the user's cart with item removal and checkout handling, requiring login to view or proceed.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Lists available books with search filtering and loading states for the catalog view.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout flow handling cart review, balance validation, and order submission with redirects and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing a hero section and a featured book list fetched from the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/MyLibraryPage.tsx: Displays the logged-in user's purchased books with options to read content via a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows confirmation details for a completed order, listing purchased items and navigation options.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Provides helpers for formatting token amounts, principals, and timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/orderId.ts: Generates unique order IDs using timestamps and random numbers.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Parses and validates principal strings using the ICP SDK.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and layout plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project requirements, existing features, and architectural notes for the e‑commerce app.
